summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARC Tanzania Project Management System with role-specific dashboards. All backend APIs working with 100% success rate. Frontend fully functional with CEO charts (Profit Comparison bar chart, Contract Status Distribution pie chart, Staff Allocation horizontal bar chart), Finance dashboard with contract management, Operations dashboard with search functionality, and Worker dashboard with task views. Mobile responsive design and Framer Motion animations working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor overlay click issue on mobile - sidebar doesn't close when clicking overlay in some cases

passed_tests: Health check endpoint (100% success)
Authentication for all three roles - CEO (sadi@arc.com/12345678), Finance (maureen.bangu@ar-consurt-world.com/12345678), Operations (juma.h.kasele@gmail.com/11223344)
CEO Dashboard with executive overview and three charts: Profit Comparison (bar chart), Contract Status Distribution (pie chart), Staff Allocation Overview (horizontal bar chart)
CEO stat cards: Total Contract Value, Total Actual Profit, Active Contracts, Total Staff Allocated, Average Profit Margin
Finance Dashboard with stat cards: Active Projects, Expired Projects, Total Profit, Contract Value, Staff Allocated
Finance contract management table with Contract Number, Client Name, Effective Date, End Date, Contract Value, Actual Profit, Status, Actions
Operations Dashboard with stat cards: Active Operations, Completed, Delayed, Inactive, Total Contract Value
Operations table with Invoice ID, Contract #, Client Name, Project Type, Start Date, End Date, Status, Actions
Search functionality in Operations dashboard working correctly
Worker Dashboard with personalized welcome message and task statistics: To Do, In Progress, Completed, Overdue
Worker My Tasks section showing assigned tasks and projects
Filter tabs working (All Contracts, Active, Expired, Inactive) with real-time filtering
Task Board with 4 Kanban columns (To Do, In Progress, Review, Done)
New Contract modal in Finance dashboard with form fields for contract creation
New Task modal in Task Board with contract selection and assignment
Team Management page with role statistics (CEO, FINANCE, OPERATIONS, WORKER)
Mobile responsive design - hamburger menu appears on mobile (390x844)
Mobile sidebar opens correctly when hamburger menu is clicked
Framer Motion animations on stat cards and UI elements
Role-based navigation - each role sees appropriate menu items
Auto-generated contract numbers in ARC-YEAR-XXXX format
Profit calculations: Target = 30% × Contract Value, Actual = Value - (Staff Cost + Commission + Tax + Admin Fee + Overhead)
Profit status indicators (Green: Actual ≥ Target, Orange: Below Target, Red: Loss)
Project status auto-calculation (Pending → Active → Expired based on dates)
Contract creation, operations setup, task management, and team performance tracking
Activity logging and dashboard statistics
Recharts integration for CEO dashboard visualizations
